verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:1
verses.text: Give ear, O ye heavens, and I will speak; and hear, O earth, the words of my mouth.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:2
verses.text: My doctrine shall drop as the rain, my speech shall distil as the dew, as the small rain upon the tender herb, and as the showers upon the grass:

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:3
verses.text: Because I will publish the name of the Lord: ascribe ye greatness unto our God.

verses.name: Deuteronomy 32:4
verses.text: He is the Rock, his work is perfect: for all his ways are judgment: a God of truth and without iniquity, just and right is he.
